Dim thisItem As Item = Me 'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
' check conditions of Document Collection item's data here ' And Return an error, if conditions are not met '...
' Then, as a last step before the release transtion finishes ... ' promote all linked top DocNodes "Released" -- Dim topNodes As Item = Me.newItem("Document Collection DocNodes","get") topNodes.setAttribute("select","id,sort_order,related_id(keyed_name)") topNodes.setProperty("source_id",thisItem.getID()) topNodes = topNodes.apply()
Dim suIdentityWasGranted As Boolean Dim suIdentity As Aras.Server.Security.Identity suIdentity = Aras.Server.Security.Identity.GetByName("Aras PLM") suIdentityWasGranted = Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.GrantIdentity(suIdentity)
Dim i As Integer For i=0 To topNodes.getItemcOunt()-1
' get item first to see it's conditions (must be Preliminary) Dim DocHierarchyNode As Item = Me.newItem("Document Hierarchy Node","get") DocHierarchyNode.setID(topNodes.getItemByIndex(i).getProperty("related_id","invalid")) DocHierarchyNode.setAttribute("serverEvents","0") DocHierarchyNode.setAttribute("select","state,is_current,name,major_rev") DocHierarchyNode = DocHierarchyNode.apply() If DocHierarchyNode.getItemCount() > 0 And DocHierarchyNode.getProperty("state","") = "Preliminary" And DocHierarchyNode.getProperty("is_current","") = "1" Then DocHierarchyNode.setAction("promoteItem") DocHierarchyNode.setProperty("state","Released")
DocHierarchyNode = DocHierarchyNode.apply() If DocHierarchyNode.isError() Then Return DocHierarchyNode End If
Next i
If suIdentityWasGranted Then Aras.Server.Security.Permissions.RevokeIdentity(suIdentity) Return Me
